page.title: 06Employment
page.content: Apart from agriculture & horticulture the main employment in the Small Dole area comes from the industrial estate in Small Dole. This is a thriving and expanding estate and the main works consist of civil engineers, contract packaging, sawmills, boat repairs and machine engineering. At Golding Barn Farm new farm buildings have been built and the old ones are now used for small workshops consisting of a builder, upholsterer, tyre retreads, car bodyworks, double glazing and Sussex Print Finisher. Shrings is a smoked fish industry which brings useful employment. The Shamrock Farm is an establishment for the breeding of primates for medical research where a number of persons are employed & at their offices in Small Dole. Shoreham Cement Works also provides jobs at its quarry & works
